question: Which country's team has won the 2017 FIFA Under-17 World Cup?
explanation: England has won their first-ever FIFA Under-17 World Cup by defeating European Champions Spain in the final by 5-2 at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata on October 28, 2017. England\'s goal-machine Rhian Brewster won the \'Golden Boot\' with 8 goals to his credit.
